amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete language in the bill that prohibits the use of Federal funds for political advocacy.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 64 in the Congressional Record of July 31, to delete the provisions of the bill that prohibit any group that is a recipient of a federal grant from spending any grant money, or more than 5% of their total funds for political advocacy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Skaggs amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 232 (Roll no. 622).
